alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 3:47AM MST until January 07 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of a trace to 1 inch below 3000 feet elevation and up to 3 inches above 3000 feet elevation. * WHERE...Lower Washington County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
